tracks.text: Bandi Namco
Bandai Namco Filmworks
Kodansha
Grass grows around the old, cracked skeleton of a small, horned humanoid.
A girl bends down and picks up a nearby twig
The young, blue haired girl holds a collection of twigs. She wears a yellow shawl, red skirt, and brown boots. She walks through the woods, where other women also gather twigs.
The girl picks a purple fruit. She shields her eyes, looks at the cloudy, blue sky, and smiles.
An elf and a human hold bow and arrows.
She hurries towards an old woman, sitting on a rock next to buckets of water
The sky darkens
The water ripples
Grass blows in the wind. Nikola stares, wide eyed.
Giant, blue, bug-eyed blobs tower over the villagers. Smoke drifts from their giant mouths.
A dragon roars. Villagers run.
Nikola drops the twig bundle, staring forward, as villagers run past her.
A dragon's foot lands near her. An eye spins then looks down.
She steps back. A hand reaches from a bush and grabs her leg.
She clasps her hands together and tenses. Dragon feet stomp around her.
Dust clouds
The dragon slowly passes her
In the distance, more dragons cross the valley
The sky lightens. Nikola turns around to see the back of the dragon, gouging the land as it moves.
The bush rustles. Nikola turns around.
A tall, muscular man stands up.
Nikola steps away, then looks the man up and down.
He has short red hair, pouches around his belt, and a cape made of leaves tied around his neck.
At the top of a high, rocky cliff sits a large, modern tent.
Barrels flank the outside of the tent, as well as filling the inside.
Stocks of arrows sit in a row. The muscular man wraps bandages around Nikola's ankle.
He approaches a desk with papers
The ground shakes. Nikola and Haga look around.
Haga tenses. A dragon beats its head against a nearby rock face. Haga and Nikola run outside to look.
Haga writes on paper
Wind blows through Nikola's hair.
Our view rises from the pair, over the chasms and valleys, past the forest and mountains, to the sky.
Text appears. Quality Assurance in another world.
The text turns to dust and blows away
A desk with paper and books is flanked by torches
We approach the paper, depicting clouds, which part to reveal a map. It depicts the island of Clayborne.
Text. Number 1. Nikola the Servant Girl.
In the village a man and a boy transport barrels. Kids run around with wooden swords. Near a building, a sign depicts a frothing mug.
3 patrons drink. In the dark kitchen, Nikola chops a root vegetable.
She stokes a fire
She lifts a lid from a boiling pot, and adds chopped vegetables.
She red stew bubbles.
Nikola sits and stares at the fire.
She looks up
A female elf sings, while a male elf plays a lute. Subtitles. Making his way in the world with a sword. Guided by fate. He will save this world.
The patrons cheer.
Haga's tent
Haga beats a hammer against an anvil.
He inspects his crafted arrowhead.
He places it next to another 10 arrows, and looks at over a hundred more in quivers.
He picks up paper
He puts on glasses
There are binders depicting Day 1, 21, 31, 41, 51
He writes in Japanese. He fills out a table with columns including Date, Priority, and Reproducibility.
Nikola watches
He pulls a stone tablet from his belt.
He places the paper on the tablet.
The paper glows blue and erupts in a column of light that streams through the tent and into the sky.
Nikola watches from the entrance to the tent.
She steps forward and Haga turns around.
Haga sweats, screams, and falls backwards.
She produces a pot of stew
He takes a tray of stew and bread. Nikola looks at the arrows.
He takes a bite of stew
She smiles widely. Haga eyes widen and he blushes slightly.
The ground shakes. Haga tenses.
She runs off. Haga puts a hand to his heart.
Nikola approaches the village. Haga watches from the tent.
Now Loading... King's Seeker. The kings of Clayborne formed a force of adventurers to investigate disasters occuring throughout the island. They are known as King's Seekers.

Now Loading... Western Sea. The conditions in Southwestern Clayborne are unknown. According to one theory, the descendants of an ancient kingdom reside there in a hidden paradise. However, as the area is surrounded by raging seas, no one has returned from investigating the area.
At sunset, a dragon twitches. It leans back, a large white blob stretching up, out of its mouth.
A vertical row of needle like teeth stretches across the blob. Saliva runs across the blob, which steams and then screams.
Nikola runs through the valley. She looks over her shoulder.
The dragon's second mouth glows blue, then shoots fireballs into the air.
The villagers run away
They gather on a nearby cliff, overlooking the village.
Haga approaches the dragon from a cliff. He holds a bow.
The dragon stomps the ground and screams. The force of its breath is wind, blowing Haga's hair. He looks forward with a determined expression.
He pulls back an arrow
He stares straight forward, at the dragon's second mouth.
The arrow lands to the right of the second mouth. The dragon blinks.
Haga picks up a barrel, and places it at the edge of the cliff.
He kicks it over, and it falls down to the dragon's feet.
It explodes.
The dragon glares.
Arrow. Barrel. Arrow. Barrel.
The villagers look around
Sunset fades to twilight.
Haga pants
The villagers gather around the barrels and quivers
Haga's chapped lips tighten
The villagers race towards the dragon, carrying barrels and readying arrows. The dragon bares down on them, it's vertical mouth open wide, revealing 2 more circles of needle like teeth.
Fire light shines on a lifeless dragon eye. Arrows stick out of its bloody body.
Haga walks from the dragon and crowd.
Nikola runs and leaps onto Haga
He looks her up and down from all angles.
She bows at a 30 degree angle.
Her face and aura sparkle
Her feet start to smoke
She bursts into flames
Nikola and all the villagers burst into flames. Haga falls to his hands and knees, tears streaming down his face.
Haga approaches the tent at night
He places a lantern next to his paper
He stares vacantly. His fist clenches.
The 5 people sit in pods amidst a nest of wires. The pods glow blue.
Haga watches himself move his hand. A green haired female elf and a blue haired man watch.
Kuro has large, toned muscles. He stands near a squat dwarf.
Kuro flies in the air
In the tent, the human leader sits at a table. Kuro, the dwarf, and the elf gather around him.
A yellow shawl moves through the night
Haga turns to the tent entrance
He pulls back the tent flap and his eyes widen. Nikola stands in the dark, wearing a vacant expression.
Nikola sways, closes her eyes, and collapses.
To be continued.
Credits roll near stylized still drawings. Nikola carries a staff and walks ahead of Haga.
A dog man, Haga, and Nikola stand in a mountainous area. Haga and holds a paper and quill. Nikola holds the same and watches Haga. The dog man smiles.
The dog man sits, holding papers with colorful rectangles. Nikola and Haga stand at the far side of the room, near windows.
Haga, Nikola, the dog man, and a silver haired elf girl sit around a campfire, eating meat. The sun sets behind the woods surrounding them.
Nikola looks up, mouth open wide. A blue stream of light flickers and rises above her, shooting into the sky, until it explodes in fireworks.
Haga, Nikola, the dog man, and the silver haired elf girl stare at the night sky over mountains. Nikola points at the blue firework, sparkling above them.
Nikola floats in the air, glowing purple, and holding a wooden staff.
Haga, the dog man, and the silver haired elf stand in a lit, green grove. Nikola runs to them as the dog man waves.
